pages.text: The $(mob)Skeleton Horse$() is a rare monster that spawns during $(thing)Thunderstorms$(). If approached, several $(l:minecraft_skeleton)$(mob)Skeletons$() riding $(mob)Skeleton Horses$() appear and will attack the player.$(p)When its rider $(l:minecraft_skeleton)$(mob)Skeleton$() is defeated, the $(mob)Skeleton Horse$() becomes passive and acts like a stylish tamed $(l:minecraft_horse)$(mob)Horse$().
